item.title: Dems Fight Voter ID Amendment In Wisconsin Despite 7 In 10 Voters Supporting It
item.description: Despite voter ID popularity both statewide and nationally, Democrats are fighting the referendum soon to appear on the Wisconsin ballot.

item.title: The Biden Administration Made NASA A Cesspool Of DEI Lunacy
item.description: The Biden administration watered down NASA's critical mission and replaced it with diversity trainings.

item.title: Yes, The Trump Administration Has The Power To Deport Mahmoud Khalil
item.description: Mahmoud Khalil's arrest and the revocation of his green card are constitutional actions well within the powers granted to the federal government.

item.title: Covid Taught Americans To Stop Trusting A Government That Puts Them Last
item.description: The reaction to Covid showed Americans the system wasn't going to save them. They were going to have to do it themselves.

item.description: To ensure economic and national security, America needs more ships.
